bug.author: wutaomsft
bug.summary: [BUG] two out of three notebooks empty on master.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Only lightgbm notebook is a legit notebook. When opening the other two notebooks from browser, Jupyter gives error that they are not JSON but in fact they are of 0 bytes. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
